page.descriptionAdmin: Manage enrollment applications for the organization
page.descriptionClient: Review the status of your enrollment applications

emptyMessageClient: You haven't submitted any applications yet

transfer.title: Transfer Application
transfer.description: Move this application to another existing member account.
transfer.inviteDescription: Invite a member and then assign this application once they join.
transfer.confirmDescription: The source account will immediately lose access to this application.

errors.generic: Failed to transfer application. Please try again.

detail.howDidYouHear: How Did You Hear About Us

summary.title: Payment Summary
summary.description: Overview of all fees and payments for this application

tooltips.selectToPay: Select one or more fees to make a payment
tooltips.selectToMarkAsPaid: Select one or more fees to mark as paid in cash
tooltips.selectToDelete: Select one or more fees to delete

deleteDialog.title: Delete fees?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete the selected fees. This action cannot be undone.

deleteRecurringScopeDialog.title: Delete recurring installments?
deleteRecurringScopeDialog.description: Choose whether recurring charges should remove only the selected installment(s) or also each following installment in the same plan.

markAsPaidDialog.title: Mark as paid in cash?
markAsPaidDialog.description: This will mark the selected fees as fully paid via cash payment. This action cannot be undone.
markAsPaidDialog.accountability: Your account will be registered as responsible for this cash payment transaction. The system will maintain a record of your account as the person who processed this payment for accountability purposes.

amount.multiFeeNote: To record a partial payment, select a single fee.

form.recurringPreview: This plan will generate {count} monthly installments automatically.

payments.emptyState: All fees have been paid. Check the Transaction History tab to view payment records.

activeFees.title: Current fees to process
activeFees.empty: No fees due right now. Upcoming recurring installments are listed below.

projection.title: Upcoming recurring installments
projection.description: Projection only. Each installment becomes actionable after the current one is paid.

editRecurringScope.title: Update recurring installment
editRecurringScope.description: Choose whether to apply this change only to this installment or rebalance this and following installments.

recurringEditDialog.title: Edit recurring charges
recurringEditDialog.description: Update the projected recurring schedule and review how each upcoming installment will be distributed.

projection.title: Projected installments
projection.description: Preview of every upcoming installment after applying these changes.

chart.title: Distribution
chart.caption: Each slice represents one installment amount.

schedule.title: Installment timeline
schedule.description: Adjust any installment amount. Remaining installments rebalance automatically.
schedule.empty: Select a valid range to preview the projected schedule.

warnings.paidInstallments: You cannot reconfigure this projected range because one or more installments in it already have payments.

errors.invalidRange: Select a valid start and end month.
errors.paidInstallments: A paid installment exists in the selected recurring range.
errors.lockedExceedsTotal: Custom installment amounts exceed the total amount.
errors.totalMismatch: When all installments are custom, their sum must match the total amount.
errors.saveFailed: Could not save recurring changes. Please try again.

errors.saveFeeFailed: Could not save changes. Please try again.

transactions.title: Transaction History
transactions.description: All payment transactions for this application
transactions.searchPlaceholder: Search by fee, amount, or reference...

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Upload required documents for this application

deleteDialog.title: Delete document?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete this document from the application. This action cannot be undone.

deleteTypeDialog.title: Delete document type?
deleteTypeDialog.description: This will permanently delete this custom document type. If a file was uploaded, it will also be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
